website_summaries.verdict: Choose this indoor memorial if you want to create a shadowbox of memories of your pet, or need a safe place for his or her ashes.
pros: An attractive keepsake box made of solid wood
Has a slot for a photo and a clay impression kit for a paw print of your friend
Roomy enough to keep items that will always remind you of your cat or dog
Can also be used for ashes
cons: The paw print creates a nice memory, but can be challenging to make

customer_reviews.title: This Pearhead Memory Box is Smaller and Less Functional than it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I hoped the dimensions listed for this product were erroneous, but unfortunately they are correct. This is the third Pearhead Memory Box I've purchased. As you can see in the photos, they used to be larger, and they used to have a removable tray that I used to store flat items, such as photos and sympathy cards. The urn I have inside the larger box would not fit in the new box. So, congratulations Pearhead. You saved a few pennies per unit. Your product is now smaller and less functional than it used to be. You are no longer serving the needs of your customer base.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memorial Box
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks ago I said goodbye to my best friend. It's been extremely hard but I love that this box serves as beautiful resting place for my Delilah. The box is large enough to hold the wooden urn box I received from the vet, her collar, some cards, and there is room to spare. For reference I included a photo of the box containing her ashes as well. I was not able to use the included clay print kit so I used that space for a photo of her digital paw print that I received from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Best way to honor a pet
customer_reviews.text: This item succeeded my expectation. It is the perfect item if you want to build a memorial and honor a pet. A plaque is not included and has to be ordered separate, which is also available on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Barb H.

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful keepsake box for a very difficult time.
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for me to write this review because I bought it to keep my 14 year old beagle's cremains in. The box is larger than it appears but not too big that you can't place it somewhere that makes sense. I keep mine on my nightstand. My box currently holds a small box with her cremains, a toy, 2 collars, a picture and the cementary paperwork. Nothing is stuffed in there. Although nothing can replace my doggie being able to see her picture and paw print before I go to sleep and when I wake up makes it a little easier to handle each day.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Best memorial urn for beloved pet(s)
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect urn for our sweet dog. It has plenty of room inside for his ashes, collar, a little hair clipping, and his favorite toy. I love the paw print on top and the picture frames on all sides. When his bonded mate joins him over the rainbow bridge one day, we will put her in with him and use 2 photo spots for her and two for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial box
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing memorial box. It holds the ashes (my dog was 55 lbs), pictures and a toy. Also a great place to show her paw print that won't get broken. I did not use the clay that comes with the package as I had the one from the vet which was larger. The paw impression I used was about 5"x 4". I initially glued it too close to the edge of the paper so be sure you put the cardboard shadow box on before gluing. The inside dimensions of the box are 9 1/4" w x 4 3/4" d x 7 1/8" h. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJN

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT resting place for my baby girl.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect resting place for my beloved Roxy. Plenty of room for her remains, collar and favorite toy. To help others know if this is right for their pet, Roxy was 14 years old and an 85 pound large labrador mixed breed dog. I purchased this at a lower price option that said “some damages “ but I found none. It arrived in the original box still taped shut. I have very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: LOOKSFORDEALS

customer_reviews.title: Final resting place...beautiful box 12/16/16
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my beloved 15 yr old cat that we had to put to sleep. Since 11/16/16, I have struggled putting her in this. Guess I'm not ready or have found closure to the situation yet. The vet supplied us with her ashes and paw prints as requested. I will use the other side for another picture versus using the clay to make paw prints. It is a descent size box so it will hold the ashes (my cat came back in a little box), pictures, etc as described. The outside cardboard box used to package this looked like it was the last one they had, but the actual product wasn't damaged or scratched inside. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect box - No damage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this box trying to plan ahead as my Mini Schnauzer is getting close to her last days. Actually saw this keepsake box on a list of things loved by pet owners on Facebook, and now I know why -it will be perfect. - Currently, I'm storing hair clippings, two toys and her old collars - at 21 lbs, I'm sure that her ashes will also fit without issue. - Contrary to some reviews, this box arrived in perfect condition - no dents, knicks, or damage at all. Packaged in its own box, and then repackaged for shipping in a tight package. Well worth the money to honor my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Espresso is not the true color
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd memory box I have purchased from this company. The color shades of all three are different. This last one is also smaller as another reviewer noted. That is not as bad as the color of the box. Espresso should be a dark coffee color. This box is definitely reddish and more mahogany, although not as pretty as that. Almost a reddish-purple. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neverdahl

customer_reviews.title: Air Out Prior to Use
customer_reviews.text: This memory box arrived in perfect shape, as pictured. It is beautiful and is a perfect pet memorial. One strong suggestion to others is to air the box out first before using; it has a very strong wood finish smell. I didn't realize this so now everything that I placed inside has this chemical/finish smell. My cat's collar, and small fur collection is ruined. Great product - but would be nice if it didn't have such a strong odor. Other buyers, its a great product, just air it out for a few weeks first before using.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Nice product & loved the paw print
customer_reviews.text: Quality of product is nice - basic, not fancy, but nice. We really liked that it had space for our dog's photo and her pawprint. Actually we did not use the pawprint kit that came with the urn because the crematory provided her pawprint clay as part of their service (but we used the clay that came with urn for our other dog). The box is a nice dark wood, sturdy, with plenty of room for her ashes and favorite tennis ball and collar. We also ordered a brass nameplate to affix to the box (not here yet). It's nice to be able to see her pawprint and photo as we miss our labrador so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chelly BW

customer_reviews.title: Slight imperfections but good value
customer_reviews.text: I really love the urn/memorial box but I did have a few imperfections. One of the plastic photo panes was heavily scratched and unevenly cut at the bottom. I checked to make sure that the scratches were not just a protective film...it was not. All other panes were fine. One of the corners of my box was chipped when I received it. I wanted to use the urn right away, so I just covered it with black marker. I did not find a way that I could contact the seller to request that they send a new window pane.
customer_reviews.author: Carie C

customer_reviews.title: Simple, clean, and elegant
customer_reviews.text: We lost our little best friend and we wanted to keep him in our thoughts and this was the best option for us. Nice, simple, and elegant. I like the regular size photo frame which I switch out occasionally to relive some nice memories, and the shadow box side holds his tags and paw print very nicely. Again the fact that it's very simple and clean looking, it fits very nice in our shelf and gives us comfort knowing hes very much in our hearts everyday
customer_reviews.author: V. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: I Read others reviews and my thoughts are exactly like others. The box is very nice and my fur baby ashes in her bag pouch fit perfectly in there. Along with her birth/death certificates and her collar. Although there is a few scratches along the top edge (I’m sure I’ll be able to touch up with a stain pen). Other than that I’m completely happy. Her paw print that was made by the vet after her death. It did fit in there but a slight of it is hidden from the picture mat.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! Beautiful memory box
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful box. It was a lot larger than I anticipated. I had just lost my beloved fur baby and was looking for something that spoke to my grieving heart that would display a picture of her, her paw print and her ashes. This box has done this and so much more. Now I have an extremely beautiful and tasteful piece of art to store her ashes and other small keepsakes of hers. This is unexpected blessing. I didn't need the paw print kit. I appreciate the other items that were included even though they were unnecessary in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Not an Urn but a very nice memory box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Memory Box but is definitely not an urn. The box is beautiful and large and offers plenty of room to store pets collars, tags, favorite toys. If your pets ashes were contained in another container then this could be used to store the container. It is not an Urn and can not be sealed. Ashes would not be contained in the box. I did not try making the paw print so I can't say it that works or not.
customer_reviews.author: AceBear

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty nice and the paw print is an awesome feature
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It does look a little cheaper than I expected but I really like the paw print idea and the price so I'm giving it 4 stars. I had no problems at all with the paw print card. I did it on my two healthy 15 year old dogs (standing up) because I didn't want to deal with it when they were ill. The paw print pad is pretty cool, the animal's paw never touches the ink - there's a thin film between the paw and the ink. Impressive design.
customer_reviews.author: karenman

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a few minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: I think that this memorial is very beautiful, but it has a few flaws. I made the paw, but once it dried, it was slightly raised which made it impossible for the sticker adhesive to work. I used hot glue instead and it worked very well. Also, I wish there was some sort of latching function in case it gets knocked over. I would like a little more security that my baby inside will stay safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to reunite our two dogs together again. 💜💙
customer_reviews.text: This box is absolute perfect to keep our two furbabies together. Our Brandy passed in 2016 and our Spirit passed last week. They were 60 and 40 pounds and there was plenty of room inside to place both of their ashes plus some keepsakes. Instead of using one side for a paw print I used both for pictures. I couldn’t be more pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: T. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keepsake box.
customer_reviews.text: Box is nice and a good size. Was able to fit so many of my beloved cats favorite items in the box. Didn’t put her ashes in. they are separate but it would fit them easily if that was all I was putting in. Using this more as a keepsake box for her things. Didn’t use the clay as my vet made foot impressions for me but this fit their impressions in the window. Haven’t picked out the photo yet for the other frame but love that is has the two spaces. It is a great memory box.
customer_reviews.author: holcojo

customer_reviews.title: Will hold my angle perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The only suggestion I would give is if you know this day is coming to order prior. The ink pad for the paw they provided was very nice but unfortunately for me I was not able to use it for my babies paw print. I will save it to use for another pet and I hope that isnt for a long time from now. It will hold my boy perfect when I get his ashes back. I love the rotating picture box, my unfortunate task now is trying to pick my favorite pictures to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I know a few of the reviews for this item said it cake damaged, etc but I thought I’d give it a shot. Well, I’m just as disappointed as some of you all. One of back corners was badly chipped. The lid came completely off because the holes that the hinges were drilled into were completely stripped, as if the screws had been drilled in and out multiple times before the item arrived. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Foster

customer_reviews.title: A great tribute to our sweet girl
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful memory box for our precious angel. We are not using this as an urn, however i think it would make a beautiful urn. We wanted to use this as a functional memory box. We didn’t realize how much stuff we had that we just could part with (collar, outfits, pictures, toys, etc). This memory box is simple and would look nice anywhere. Very appreciative that amazon carries this and that it’s under prime.
customer_reviews.author: Jillana

customer_reviews.title: Pearhead Dog Memory Box
customer_reviews.text: Pearhead is a great company that makes quality products. We have bought several over the years. We got this memorial box to store some of our pug’s favorite things to go along with his memorial. It is well made and sturdy, however, wish it was just a bit bigger, otherwise it’s a great product and we would recommend this memory box.
customer_reviews.author: wami

customer_reviews.title: it's beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: this box is well made. its a beautiful piece to honor your pet ! easy to put together (may need some glue to hold the "paw print" in place) . i am not sure on the quality of the paw print stone stuff because i will not be using it (already had one made). it has a choise of a few different color scheme to chose from which i liked . but all in all i would definitely recommend this memorial box to anyone looking to honor their loved fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: No paw print material, heartbroken not having time to get any!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box and memorial for my dog. However no clay "paw print material" was included. Have an appointment at the vet and won't have time to go and get clay to do a paw print of my best friend. I am heartbroken over having to take my best friend to the vet and now not being able to have the last memory of his paw makes this worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I loved this beautiful box. It holds my pets ashes, leash and collar as well as some tennis balls. The one thing it was a bit bothersome was, the "lid" I guess you'd call it. Wasn't perfectly flushed all around the box, it's off a teenie tiny bit. It's not drastic, as I could possibly fix that myself, so I stick with the 5 stars! When my cat goes, I'll be back to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memory box to honor your furbabies
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful memory box which offers a good amount of storage. We were able to not only put our sweet Moxie's ashes inside, but also some of her favorite toys. I love that it allows you to display both a picture and their clay paw print. It came with a paw print kit, but we used the one provided by our vet. As others have noted, the corner had a small piece missing, but overall it is a lovely piece fit for a beautiful kitty who left us far too soon.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought, but my remains returned were...smaller than I thought...It's great that I was able to put a picture in there. However, it's tricky to get it in. I wear a women's medium sized glove, and I found it to be tricky accesing the picture frame, from the bottom of the urn. However, once the picture was finally in, it was a simple matter of four tiny screws and a flip right side up. It looks good. I would recommend this for my friends with fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Balek

customer_reviews.title: nice and just right
customer_reviews.text: I got three of these and all of them are exactly alike, no chips, cracks or nasty smell to them. It does fit the paw print that the vet gave us and enough space for ashes, papers, toy, and coller. I had two poms and a husky/collie mix that I got these for. Poms were 8-12 pounds when alive and the husky was 60 pounds. Fit all the dogs things without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice box that is well made.
customer_reviews.text: I just lost my dog of 14 years and wanted some thing to Remember her by and this fits the bill. It has a front that you can put her paw print and picture in. Because my dog is already gone I could,t get a paw print , so I used both sides for two pictures. I am very pleased with this item .
customer_reviews.author: Thousands of Books Read

customer_reviews.title: a loving tribute, highly recommended at a time of serious loss
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my, now passed, pooch. Lovely memorial box. About a week after attaching the paw print the adhesive let it fall down, but since it was in the box it was an easy fix and not broken. A lovely memorial for my darling girl who was with us for 15 years. The box was spacious enough that when her ashes were given to us in a hand carved box that also fit inside. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: During a difficult time of loss, this made our remembrance a little easier to plan.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made on Amazon. This memorial box fit a paw print we had received from the vet and all of his items we wanted to save including his collars, a Halloween costume, leash, and sympathy cards received with room to spare. The sticky tape worked perfectly to hold the print into place on the backboard. I printed out a favorite 4x6 and taped it to the frame. There's glass in the front and the picture and paw print are carefully slid down into place. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: S Loftin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well made.
customer_reviews.text: I've lost TWO dogs/pets in the last year and purchased one for each of them. This is a very nice memorial box for them. Large enough for ashes, collars, etc. that I wanted to place inside and I like the picture/paw print space. Tape is a little light though, but that may be only because I had the vet make the paw print. Which I do recommend that you specify the dimensions to make sure it will fit if you do the same.) Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: LSD

customer_reviews.title: A Good Place for Memories
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed after my little man crossed the rainbow bridge. Without him here I needed something physical to represent him while I wait for his ashes to come back. I ordered it after he passed so was unable to use the paw print kit. Instead I put in two photos. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dani & Devin

customer_reviews.title: Sweet keepsake for a fur babies items
customer_reviews.text: I got this before my sweet boy passed away. I knew I would want his paw print before we said goodbye. I'm so glad I got the box because I am able to store some of his most precious items in it for safe keeping. I will update once I get his picture put inside.
customer_reviews.author: IamSam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Sturdy, and bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded our expectations! We were really worried that our 85lb boxer wouldn’t fit in here, but the box of his ashes only took 2/3 of the space inside. There was enough room for his ringing box with his hair and his clay paw print, and I’m sure I could fit more in there. This product is super sturdy too. Picture frames are perfect. The only thing left for us to do is have his name and date plates made. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Customer 87

customer_reviews.title: Perfect place to hold pet ashes and memorabilia
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to keep my dogs ashes and collar in. This works perfectly. I also put a picture of him, along with the paw print plaque that the vet clinic provided on the outside. Suggestion if you also want to display a similar plaque: 1) remove the mat, which will give more room for the plaque, and 2) use command strips instead of double sided tape for the plaque.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love this Box
customer_reviews.text: As heart broken as I was to have to buy this after losing a family dog, it was the best purchase I could had made, and plan on buying another when we lose our other one. It is good size, can fit many items inside or ashes. It's beautiful and customizable depending if you want two pics or one and a paw casting. I have a pic and a paw casting and it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O.

customer_reviews.title: Memory Box for your pet
customer_reviews.text: It's a great memory box for your pet. I was able to put his box of ashes his collar and his favorite toy in there. I sealed it shut. The place vet was able to do the paw print for me. So I was able to fit it perfect in the frame. Other than the sadness of losing your furry family member it's a great memory box
customer_reviews.author: BostonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Paw print component missing and difficult to execute.
customer_reviews.text: The memorial box itself is decent. We ordered two because unfortunately, we had two senior dogs with failing health. We opened them about a week after they arrived to find one box didn’t contain the paw print pad component. Furthermore, One of our dogs passed away and when we tried to take his print per the instructions, we failed miserably... 3 times. At that point and in that moment, each attempt became more gut-wrenching, so we gave up. We now have a terrible excuse for a paw print which is actually worse than not having one at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kroskey, CFP, MBA

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was nicer than we expected. The box displays a total of 5 photos. The inside is quite large and was able to hold not only our pet's ashes, but many of his beloved little belongings. This was a great purchase during such a hard time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy, under the circumstances
customer_reviews.text: We lost our boy about a month ago to a rare cancer. This box allows us to display his paw print (which I had made from the Vet), a picture, holds his small ashes tin and some toys/shirt that belonged to him. It's perfect. No scratches (which I read about in the reviews) and it seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice box,  although a lot smaller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a blemished item & found it in better condition than expected. It's smaller than the version I bought several years ago, but it'll work to hold a few photos, a collar, and a toy when my girlie's time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael R-W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for under these sad circumstances. Holds the remains of my 80lb baby and her collar. The picture holders are a sweet touch. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely way to memorialize your pet.
customer_reviews.text: My Peanut was loved beyond measure. I now have a place to store her memories. The footprint was done when they took her to be cremated. The box holds her ashes, rabies tags and collar as well as pictures of my sweet girl. I added some extra pictures inside the lid.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Way To Keep My Pets Memory Alive
customer_reviews.text: This item was the exact item I needed to keep my beloved Ben"s memory alive. I put 2 photos inside and the paw print outside. And it fits the entire urn with his ashes inside as well as the certificate of private cremation and sympathy cards I received. Thank you for making this perfect item.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Urbauer

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the trouble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use a memory box/urn for my cat "Bee" that recently passed away. I was so eager to receive this so I can get it all set up for her but when i received itx it was completely broken! The wood is of very cheap quality, the wooden frame and glass were broken aswell. I returned it immediately and made my own memory box out of a shadow box. It came out better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. I.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Big enough to put his toys, ashes, and letters received for his passing. It is sturdy, and well made! Definitely warmed my heart once I put it all together. It’s worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: KMON

customer_reviews.title: An amazing way to remember your friend
customer_reviews.text: We lost our buddy in February due to liver failure. We had him cremated and had his urn places in this memorial. It is big enough for his collar and fav toys. We also have his paw print and picture. This product is something I wished I did not have to buy because I miss my buddy so much but it is an amazing piece to remember him.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: For those keepsakes
customer_reviews.text: So, buying this was really hard for me given the circumstance. I knew I had extremely limited time to get things in order while my pup's health was declining fast. I was hoping for a miracle to happen and buying this felt a little bit like I was giving up. Regardless of the circumstances, I am happy that I had ripped the proverbial bandage off and got this when I did. I like being able to have all of my girl's keepsakes in with her urn. With a picture and a paw print on the outside, I have this on my night stand so she remains close to me while I sleep at night, similarly to when she was alive.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I expected, but in a good way. Had a nice collage photo made of my pup to display in the front along with his fur clippings and nose print. The clay paw print from the vet was too big, so I just set it on top. Inside is plenty big enough to remains and collars, small toy, etc. Very pleased with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: truereview

customer_reviews.title: Love It... but forget about the paw print if you have a cat!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a pleasure place to keep some important things for my 15 year old cat who recently passed. The box looks nice and is great quality! However, I followed the instructions for the putty to do the paw print and a cat's paw print is just too hard to press into the clay to get a good imprint. I could definitely seeing it working for a bigger dog but not for a seven pound cat on his last days. Good solution to this is to just add another picture! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Memorial Urn for my best friend to rest!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. My best friend passed 9/24 and I needed nice well made Memorial Urn. Love that you can put a picture and the paw print! I also was able to add a plate!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Came in with no damage. I was able to fit four toys, a ball, and three collars with room to spare. I didn’t use the matte to accommodate the paw print better.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Put my cat Keykey up in here.  Cat was sav
customer_reviews.text: I could put my cat + his toys in here. Little cat boxes don't have pics and paw prints and room for all the fave toys! I had to give 1 star to giftable. RIP Keykey
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy box, sweet nose/paw print kit included
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy box, with a sweet option for a paw or nose print. The inside dimensions are generous and I can store cards and other momentos too. I'm very pleased with it and it honors my pet.
customer_reviews.author: Eefie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat and put some memorabilia in the box along with his ashes. I have his paw print and a picture of him in the front. I love this very much and will get one for my other animals when they pass.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Preston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item, just not for us
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice item, just too big. It fit the big paw print and everything...just looked ackward where we wanted it. Nice it holds a 4x6 and no pic cutting needed. Just needs a magnet closure or something. Especially if kids in the house so that the inside items dont get disturbed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. The quality is exceptional and the price is very fair. We are often price gouged at a vulnerable time such as when a beloved pet dies so to find this gem amongst the competition was much appreciated. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tribute, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 17 year old Sammy. He was a 20lb pug and he had a smaller box for his ashes and I ordered a medium memorial box because I wanted extra space for his bandanas, harness, pictures, and paw prints. It was a perfect way to pay tribute to him. I used the prints the cremation place gave me because I didn't receive my box in time. I thought I would have at least one more day, but he was ready to pass on. I'm really happy with how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Barrineau

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved this box. She put her dogs favorite toy and his collar inside the box. Great gift for when someone loses their pup. Even better I got it on prime same day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kayte

customer_reviews.title: Good design, needs better execution.
customer_reviews.text: Box came in with loose hinges and a busted corner. It is not solid wood which is obvious when it dings. That being said, I wanted something for my girl that would hold her paw print, photos, and ahses, which this does. I only wish that it was sturdier and came in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Holds way more than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: It holds the remains of my 100 pound dog along with in her collar, toys & her flat volleyball easily. I bought the dark wood & it’s pretty but I wished I had gotten the black. You won’t go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice memorial box. This was a hard purchase for me because I had to say goodbye to my dog after 14 years. She is missed everyday. I put this beside my bed and I put my favorite picture of her in it. I used the paw print kit for my other fur babies. There was enough for 2 separate paw prints.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Pet Memorial Urn
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality memorial urn!!! I just received it and went to pick up our Roman’s ashes. It is sturdy and well made. Funeral home personnel added photo then filled & sealed it within minutes. Paid a forth of the cost for a more aesthetic resting place.
customer_reviews.author: Laura RD

customer_reviews.title: Great display piece for my beloved dog
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. I wanted something that didn’t look too sad. This holds my 32 pound dogs remains (in another container), her collar, her clay paw, and a toy. There’s still plenty of room for other things. I put two photos of her in the front instead of the clay imprint. I should point out that that there is another memorial box by Pearhead that is slightly smaller. I noticed a few reviews are complaining that the sizes are not consistent, but there is a memory box and a memorial box.
customer_reviews.author: KristenG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely am Happy with this Product. It was Exactly what I needed after having to send my Precious Fur Baby to Rainbow Bridge. Thank You for the Product and the Pricing.
customer_reviews.author: terry Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is so incredibly beautiful. We just lost 2 dogs in a very short time, to cancer. When they were cremated, they did a paw imprint. It works PERFECT. It holds the box with their ashes, collars, and special photos. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Linda MonsonCianciosi

customer_reviews.title: This one was good enough!
customer_reviews.text: My dog passed a little over two months ago. The vet that cremated her gave us a nice, wooden box but I felt like it wasn’t enough and wanted something more personal and custom. I found this box after searching for one good enough to hold her ashes. I love it! It has enough room on the inside to hold her ashes, collar, and other things the vet gave us. It could hold even more than I have in there! I will defiantly buy again when the time comes for my other babies.
customer_reviews.author: peyton horan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect and what I was looking for. Beautiful, sturdy, well-made. A perfect memorial and resting place for my beloved P' ashes and her harness/outfit. If I didn't know it was $30, I'd swear it cost $50.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped well and very spacious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our small cat, Max. Max already had a paw print made when he was cremated, so we are using the mixture to make a paw Christmas ornament of our current cat. The box came well protected and with additional bubble wrap, so there was no damage. Very roomy inside. Holds the wooden box with his ashes, several pictures, sympathy cards, his collar, several toys, and a bag of his fur. The paw print from the vet was ever so slightly larger than the border, but I kept it included, although you can remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R Turnipseed

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: How do you get a paw print when the dog is already dead? Cheaply made. Nice concept, but quality is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful urn!
customer_reviews.text: Super sweet urn, easy to use— no issues. Love that it holds all of her pictures. <3 You can tell it will last. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: megan hicks

customer_reviews.title: Ashes to Ashes
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! I actually used it for my daughters cremated fathers ashes. I put pics of her and her Dad in it ! Priced right !
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my girl
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my dog's ashes. It arrived in perfect condition. I like that the bottom has to be screwed into place; the ashes cannot fall out or be tipped over. I also like that there is a place to put my favorite photo of her. And the price was very reasonable as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Quality Memorial Urn
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this memorial urn for my fur baby who recently passed away. The box is great and would recommend. I was able to fit his ashes, collar and his clay paw print and still have room in the box. I was not able to put his paw print on the front because it was too big. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Elzie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed and More!
customer_reviews.text: Much much larger than anticipated. There was plenty of room for her ashes plus collar and other trinkets loved by her. Plus I love that it rotates and holds four 4x4 pictures. Although it is plastic it seems very very durable. Pictures are easy to place into urn. The rest of family liked it as well. Great product for the price. Highly recommended and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This box was bigger than I expected, in a good way. It is perfect to put not only my pet's ashes container inside, but also her leash, photos and other belongings that I wanted to keep. I put one large photo in the front of the glass instead of the photo and pawprint. The pawprint kit was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Borgwardt

customer_reviews.title: I can see my furr baby everyday still 😍
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good looking box. It matches with the decoration of my house. I love it cause we see our Zacky everyday still. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely on the large side for a cat, but it’s beautiful and it was perfect. I added my own touch with the fancier paper for the background, and we didn’t use the plaster for his footprint as we were given one when we had him cremated. The edge was a little bit dented and missing some paint, but it was minor, and not worth the hassle of exchanging it. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: billy m. hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice keepsake for our fur baby
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy box. First one came broken due to shipping,but thankfully it was replaced in 2 days. Somewhat smaller than I imagined to put other items in the box for other keepsakes, but overall very happy with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and cute
customer_reviews.text: It is much larger than I expected, will hold more than one fur baby, but they always did like to snuggle. I blends in just enough that its special but not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Walters

customer_reviews.title: This was everything
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a memory box for my cat who died from cancer. Its beautiful and was able to hold all the things I wanted to keep to remember him by. It stays in my living room and looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: AKirk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box for my beloved dogs ashes
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are really very nice. I ended up buying 3 of them. Plenty of room inside for the ashes of 2 large dogs or one dog and their favorite toys etc. I added a mini photo album inside each box and it is very comforting. Good quality and look nice with the photo or photos on the front
customer_reviews.author: caspersmom

customer_reviews.title: Great urn
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful product very well-crafted led doesn't stay onto terribly tight but that could be fixed if you got a slightly bigger seal ended up sending back because my veterinarian sent him out to be cremated and he came back in a oak box
customer_reviews.author: Clairbare

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box and will be great to put stuff in after our Furbaby is gone. Nice to be able to do this to remember him by
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful memory box!
customer_reviews.text: We just lost our beloved German Shepherd, Bo, a week ago. I ordered this to help us cope and start healing. We love it! We were able to fit his urn, paw print, 2 collars, harness, leash, card from the vet, an envelope that has some of his fur, tennis ball, and a spoon from his last trip to the ice cream shop. It is very sturdy and we love how we could add pictures on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 13 year old that passed. It fits her picture and paw print in the front and her leash, cards and her ashes in back.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Honor your fur baby forever with this box.
customer_reviews.text: Five months ago I said goodbye to my fur baby. It was heartbreaking but Im so please I found this box, The box had a wonderful color, is elegant, large enough to hold the wooden urn box I received from the vet, his plate, couple of his clothing and his collar, vet also gave me his paw and I was able to place it on the box, next to my babys pictures, exactly what I was looking for!! great product, highly recommended it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Great way to honor my beloved pup. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: TWIL

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great piece to have in the house weather your little pet has passed or not provides great memories
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: A resting place for my sweet Monkey.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have my fur babies paw print, 4 pics of her, and there is room for her collar inside also. It warms my heart to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Nice box but paw print material useless
customer_reviews.text: Nice box but paw print material useless, was poorly made so will have to get something else for paw print. Box itself is nice and can use two pics since can't use paw material
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with chips in the finish
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and arrived with damage in multiple places of the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Well made. Bigger than expected. Pictures are easy to put in. Fit my pup and his taggie blanket with extra room.
customer_reviews.author: sdw81

customer_reviews.title: Good size and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I did not know it was going to be as big as it was. It is absolutely beautiful and perfect. I was able to put My dogs leash and collar, etc. I have not got her ashes back yet but I’m sure there is plenty of room for them. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorleigh

customer_reviews.title: Using for my latest dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my latest dog, Nemo. Hopefully he will like his new place.
customer_reviews.author: kloe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the dog paw print I got from the vet when my dog died. Very nice quality & beautiful! It's a nice lg size. Plenty of room for collar, blanket, favorite toys & pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Erickson

product_meta.title: Pearhead Dog Or Cat Paw Prints Pet Memory Box with Clay Imprint Kit, Perfect Pet Memorial Espresso
product_meta.description:
Style:Pet Memory Box, EspressoYour pet will always be part of the family. Always and forever cherish their memory with Pearhead’s pet memory box. This wooden, stained espresso box is the perfect keepsake for cherishing and remembering your favorite furry buddy. Frame your favorite 4” x 6” photo of your best friend to display on the front of the box. This box also includes everything you need to capture their print. And it’s perfect for dogs or cats. The box includes one package of soft, air drying clay, a ruler, and double-sided tape. Clay requires no mixing or baking! It’s also 100% pet safe. Simply knead the clay and roll it out. Press your furry buddy’s paw in the clay gently but hard enough to create an impression. If you make a mistake - no problem! You can redo it as many times as you need until you get the perfect impression. Once finished making the print, use the ruler to create a square around the impression. Let dry for 1-2 days and then use the tape to stick to the background board. This box is also great for placing some of your pet’s keepsakes and favorite things inside. The box is hinged so it can easily open and close. Place this memory box on any bookshelf or table to cherish forever. Always keep your pet close with Pearhead’s pet memory box. Product dimensions: 10.125” W x 7.875” H x 6.5” D; Photo insert: 4” x 6”.

At Pearhead, we aim to create genuine, quality products to celebrate your special moments in life. We are a family of designers, marketers, and trendsetters bringing products to life that will bring a smile to your face. From concept and design to production and customer service, the Pearhead team works together seamlessly every step of the way. Whether your baby is celebrating their first year of life, you are announcing your pregnancy, or your pup is celebrating his first holiday season, Pearhead is here to share your moments in style.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our Pawprints Memory Box is a must have for any cat or dog lover. Solid wood and stained in a rich espresso finish, this keepsake box not only has room to store your pet's most beloved mementos but also has everything included to make your furry buddy’s pawprint! Just press their paw into the non-toxic, soft air-drying clay to capture the precious imprint and place in the frame. Includes a beige background board and beveled mat to display an adorable 4" x 6" photo. Cherish your pet’s prints (tiny or big) for a lifetime! At Pearhead, we aim to create genuine, quality products to celebrate your special moments in life. We are a family of designers, marketers, and trendsetters bringing products to life that will bring a smile to your face. From concept and design to production and customer service, the Pearhead team works together seamlessly every step of the way. Whether your baby is celebrating their first year of life, you are announcing your pregnancy, or your pup is celebrating his first holiday season, Pearhead is here to share your moments in style.
feature_bullets: Create and frame an impression of your pet's paw and place next to their 4" x 6" photo
Solid wood shadowbox frame with acid-free, beige beveled mat is large enough to store your pet's most precious mementos. Box measures 10.1" x 7.7"x6.5"
No mixing and no mess.  Air dry within 24-48 hours
Includes no mess impression material, rolling pin, and clay shaping rule
